Name: Wellspring of War-Lust
Title: Eula: Wellspring of War-Lust
Desc: Flood of frost will ensure that vengeance is mine.
Source: Reward for inviting Eula to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Wellspring of War-Lust
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1106]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1106] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S11063]</color> once.
When your $[A1106], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S11062]</color>, this will generate 1 more <color=#FFFFFFFF>Zeal</color> stack for <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C111062]</color>.
(You must have $[A1106] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

C111062.Name: Lightfall Sword
C111062.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When $[A1106] uses a Normal Attack or Elemental Skill:</color> This card will accumulate 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Zeal</color> stacks, but $[A1106] will not gain Energy.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Discard this card and deal 3 $[K100]. Each <color=#FFFFFFFF>Zeal</color> stack adds 1 DMG to this damage instance.\n(Effects on this card's $[K3] will apply to <color=#FFFFFFFF>Zeal</color> stacks.)

K100.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color>
K100.Desc: Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.
